mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER (customerCode, tel, email, userName, birth) VALUES (#{customerCode}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{userName}, #{birth})
INSERT INTO MEMBER(customerCode, userId, userPwd, enabled) VALUES (#{customerCode}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{enabled})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET last_login = SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m1.customerCode, userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, last_login ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel FROM CUSTOMER m1 JOIN member m2 ON m1.customerCode = m2.customerCode WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT m1.customerCode, userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, last_login ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel FROM CUSTOMER m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member m2 ON m1.customerCode = m2.customerCode WHERE m1.customerCode = #{customerCode}

SELECT m1.customerCode, userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, last_login ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel FROM CUSTOMER m1 JOIN member m2 ON m1.customerCode = m2.customerCode WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m1.customerCode, userId, userPwd ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel FROM CUSTOMER m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member m2 ON m1.customerCode = m2.customerCode WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET userPwd = #{userPwd} WHERE userId=#{userId}
